caption:
Before you forget go ahead and share this post with someone you want to make this easy, yummy recipe with! Discover a wholesome snack idea! 🌰 This 5-ingredient treat is a sweet tooth savior and a nutritional powerhouse. 😊 And thank you @thatplantbasedstyle for this amazing recipe 

Recipe:
🌱 Plant-based
🍽️ High-protein
🍬 Low sugar
🌾 Wholesome

Ingredients:

1 can of chickpeas (rinsed and drained)
~ 20 pitted dates (adjust to your desired sweetness)
3/4 cup hemp seeds
1/2 cup cocoa powder
1 cup pumpkin purée
Optional: pinch of sea salt
Optional: cinnamon
Optional (but highly recommended): chocolate chips or cocoa nibs
Instructions:
Blend all ingredients in a food processor until smooth. Mix in chocolate chips/cocoa nibs if desired (measure with your heart 🫶). Enjoy, preferably with a warm cup of tea 🫖.

For a ball-shaped delight, chill the dough in the fridge for 30 mins. And don’t forget to save this for later!

#EvoHemp #Hempivores #JointheEvolution #HempHeals #HealthRecipe #HealthyRecipes #HealthySnack #HealthyDessert #Paleo #PlantBased #FuelYourBody #FudgyBrownies #hemphearts
